name: Move function with contracts (Calor)
prompt:
In the Calor project, move the `SafeDivide` function (f002) from src/Math.calr to src/Utils.calr. The function has both preconditions and postconditions that must be preserved.

The function has:
- §Q (!= b 0) - precondition
- §S (== result (/ a b)) - postcondition

Steps:
1. Remove SafeDivide from src/Math.calr
2. Add it to src/Utils.calr (keep ID f002 and all contracts)

IMPORTANT: Both the function ID f002 and all contracts (§Q and §S) must be preserved exactly.
